BackstoryDef.title: Revian Apprentice Craftsman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days at the great forges, learning how to shape wood and metal. [PAWN_possessive] work was much appreciated by the warriors, who often left [PAWN_possessive] snacks and gifts in exchange for equipment repairs. However, [PAWN_possessive] love of flames continued to grow unchecked...
